aka: 3 Women or Waking Up from My Bosnian Dream
三个女人或（从我的波斯尼亚梦中醒来）
this_title: 3 Žene or (waking up from my Bosnian Dream)
trans_title: 3 Women or Waking Up from My Bosnian Dream
三个女人或（从我的波斯尼亚梦中醒来）
introduction: Ivana, Clara and Marina are three women from different backgrounds living at the same time in Sarajevo. Each one fights to achieve her own goals, but most of the time society doesn't accept what's not in accordance with its norms.
foreign_title: 3 Žene or (waking up from my Bosnian Dream)
